message.raw:
Fixed some bugs in preparation for command line tool:
* uses of isinstance were previously only checking against str, not unicode so unicode strings for options were ignored. We now use the compatibility library `six` to check for instances of strings which has the benefit of being forward compatible with Python 3
* fixed requirement of filename being a global variable
* included delay kwargs in call to `silenceFilterGraph`
* fixed typo in variable name when panning right channel to left channle

message:
Fixed some bugs in preparation for command line tool:
* uses of isinstance were previously only checking against str, not unicode so unicode strings for options were ignored. We now use the compatibility library `six` to check for instances of strings which has the benefit of being forward compatible with Python 3
* fixed requirement of filename being a global variable
* included delay kwargs in call to `silenceFilterGraph`
* fixed typo in variable name when panning right channel to left channle
